summary: A modern re-telling of the classic fantasy drama by William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream holds a star-studded cast with euphoric effects and melodramatic storytelling.
cast: Matt Lucas|John Hannah|Nonso Anozie|Maxine Peake|Eleanor Matsuura|Richard Wilson|Elaine Paige|Colin McFarlane|Bernard Cribbins|Paapa Essiedu|Elliot Levey|Fisayo Akinade|Varada Sethu|Javone Prince|Kate Kennedy|Matthew Tennyson|Marlene Madenge|Hiran Abeysekera|Charlotte Dylan|Prisca Bakare|Ollie Douglas|Charlotte Blake|Samuel Rush|Tia Benbow-Hart|Ceri-Ann Williams|Sarah Sharman
title: A Midsummer Night's Dream
